𓊎 ksar قَصْر qaṣr cache® granary, or village containing a granary, in the Maghreb (Berber countries)

𓊎 ziggurat 𒅆𒂍𒉪 ziqqurratum 𓊎 ziggurat 𒊕𒃲𒆳𒆳𒊏 saggal²kurra™

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓈒 𓏥 grains 𓊎𓉴
𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓊎 cairn (hill) ⇔ Kur 𓈉 ⇔ 𓊎 ⇔ stone quarry = Hütte 𓉗𓏏𓏏𓈉
𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓈅 𓏥 Kuris : high ground, arable land

𓊎 𓊍 𓊨 sit | dais 𓍿 𓇋 𓏏 𓊍

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓊎 𒄥 𒊒𒉡 gur-ru-nu cairn heap, pile
